label: SpecifiedParameter
comment: A specified feature that is fixed for the case in question but may be different in other cases.

datatypeProperties.comment: A type, expressed as text, for this observation objective parameter.
A measure of a value of the status for this specified parameter.
The indication of whether or not the value for this specified parameter is allowed.
A tolerance specified for a value of this metric characteristic.

referencedBy.comment: A parameter applicable to this specified method.
An operational parameter applicable to this production machine.
A quality parameter specified for this trade product.
A requested operational parameter applicable to this production machine.
A parameter specified for a value for this metric characteristic.
